烖字的基本解释

烖
zāi
同“灾”。

烖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zāi］
［《廣韻》祖才切，平咍，精。］
亦作“烖1”。亦作“菑3”。亦作“灾1”。
(1)自然发生的火灾。
(2)泛指灾害，祸患。
(3)罪恶；错误。
(4)危害。
(5)焚烧。
(6)个人遭遇的不幸。

烖字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　烖； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页670第13
【集韻】災本字。詳災字註。【禮·中庸】烖及其身者也。　又【詩·大雅】不烖我躬。【箋】烖，謂見誅伐。　又【爾雅·釋詁】烖，危也。　【說文】本作?。从火?。

烖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
烖字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
烖
zāi

烖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zāi］
["Guangyun" Zucai cut, flat 咍, fine. ]
Also known as "Tuan 1". Also known as "菑3". Also known as "Disaster 1".
(1) Natural fires.
(2) Generally refers to disasters and disasters.
(3) Sin; mistake.
(4) Harm.
(5) Incineration.
(6) Personal misfortune.
烖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　烖; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 670-13
【Jiyun】The original character of disaster. Detailed note on disaster words. 【Rite·Medium】Ten and the body are also.　[Poetry·Daya] Don’t bow to me. 【Jian】Tun, that is, see to punish.　[Erya·Shi Xie] again, it is dangerous.　【Said the text】This work?. From the fire?.
